      • delete

        public static void delete(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin p,
                          java.io.File f,
                          java.lang.Runnable r)
        Attempts to delete the given plugin. Ensure the plugin is loaded and enabled for this to work. If you are deleting yourself (calling delete on your plugin in your plugin) ensure this is the LAST thing called in what ever method you are in. If not, be sure to break off or return. After this is called, it is no longer safe to use ANYTHING in your plugin
        Parameters:
        p - the plugin instance you wish to delete
        r - a runnable which is called after it has been deleted. If you are deleting yourself, it is safe to do things AFTER your plugin has been deleted, however you cannot use ANYTHING in your plugin jar.

      • load
